body_html:
In case some other n00b like me stumbles here wondering how to practically implement the py_func grad, I came up with an explicit example (after some struggling) which I posted here.

The "unique" name generation is a bit hacky...

body:
In case some other n00b like me stumbles here wondering how to practically implement the py_func grad, I came up with an explicit example (after some struggling) which I posted [here](https://gist.github.com/harpone/3453185b41d8d985356cbe5e57d67342).

The "unique" name generation is a bit hacky...
